The SPxLibJava library provides functionality to connect and configure a remote SPx server, or add radar video to an application using the SPx RDC.

See: Description

Packages 
Package Description
spx
Contains the ImgRecvApplet Java applet for receiving and displaying images and metadata from a Radar Image Server.
spx.av  
spx.av.svr
Provides the SPx AV Server GUI classes.
spx.graphics
Provides graphics related classes.
spx.net
Provides the classes for network interaction involving SPx.
spx.packets
Provides definitions for SPx packets.
spx.packets.tracks
Provides definitions for SPx track packets.
spx.proc.blob  
spx.sc.net
Provides common definitions for network using classes.
spx.utils
Provides utility classes such as the Ticker and Version classes.
The SPxLibJava library provides functionality to connect and configure a remote SPx server, or add radar video to an application using the SPx RDC.

The RemoteServer class is used for both configuring a remote server and communicating with the SPx RDC.

The RadarDisplay class can be used together with the external compositing mode of the RDC for Java based compositing of radar and graphics.

The SysUtils class contains functions to obtain native window handles associated with a Java Canvas or JFrame that are required for specifying a window for the RDC to insert radar into.

The SysUtils class contains functions to make sure the SPx RDC is running.
